hero.title: You're building your own system
hero.description: A complete ecosystem of CRM, POS, mobile apps (iOS & Android) and web to manage cafés, restaurants, and retail stores — anytime, anywhere.

whyChoosePlatform.title: Why choose our platform
whyChoosePlatform.mainTitle:
Beyond POS
A system that grows with you
whyChoosePlatform.description: We built an ecosystem that removes vendor lock-ins, works on any device, and adapts to any business — from corner cafés to international chains.

allInOne.mainTitle: Everything your store, café, or delivery business needs — in one ecosystem
allInOne.description: Our platform connects orders, payments, inventory, staff, loyalty, and marketing in one place. No extra integrations, just growth.

cards.title: Customer Experience Suite
cards.text: Mobile app, CRM, loyalty & user comfort in one place.

cards.title: POS & Staff Operations
cards.text: Smart cashier system + team control + flexible flows.

cards.title: Kitchen & Fulfillment
cards.text: Streamlined kitchen workflows and real-time cooking status.

cards.title: Inventory & Warehousing
cards.text: Full control over ingredients, supplies, and stock flow.

cards.title: Analytics & Management
cards.text: Finance, reports, performance metrics — visually and smart.

cards.title: Marketing & Customization
cards.text: Push your brand forward with full control.

cards.title: Integration & Scaling
cards.text: Open infrastructure. Grow as you go.

results.mainTitle: How teams grow faster with our CRM ecosystem
results.description: No hidden fees. No hardware lock-ins. Launch for free, scale on demand, or fully own your ecosystem under your brand.

feedback.title: Trusted by 2000+ award-winning agencies and firms

testimonials.text: Switching was easy thanks to outstanding support and clear onboarding. We now have a better overview of finances and staff management than ever before.
testimonials.name: Lucas Nguyen

testimonials.text: The platform has transformed how we manage our restaurant chain. Inventory tracking is now 3 times faster!
testimonials.name: Sarah Johnson

testimonials.text: Customer support is exceptional. They helped us migrate all our data seamlessly during the transition.
testimonials.name: Michael Chen

testimonials.text: Reporting features saved us dozens of hours each month. Highly recommend to any food business!
testimonials.name: Emma Wilson

testimonials.text: We reduced food waste by 22% in the first month thanks to better inventory management tools.
testimonials.name: David Kim

testimonials.text: The mobile app allows me to check business performance anytime, anywhere. Game changer!
testimonials.name: Olivia Martinez

testimonials.text: Integration with our accounting software was flawless. No more manual data entry!
testimonials.name: James Wilson

testimonials.text: Staff scheduling became so much easier with the drag-and-drop interface. Saved us countless hours.
testimonials.name: Sophia Lee

testimonials.text: Real-time sales analytics helped us optimize our menu and increase profits by 18%.
testimonials.name: Robert Taylor

testimonials.text: The loyalty program integration boosted our repeat customers by 35%. Amazing results!
testimonials.name: Jennifer Brown

pricePlan.title: Flexible for startups. Scalable for enterprise
pricePlan.description: No hidden fees. No hardware lock-ins. Launch for free, scale on demand, or fully own your ecosystem under your brand.

monthly.title: SaaS model
noteList: POS, CRM, delivery, inventory, finance, analytics, support, and updates.
Suitable for those who want to quickly start using our platform without launching their own application.

monthly.title: White-label
noteList: Mobile app for iOS/Android and website under your brand.
Ideal for restaurants and chains looking to develop their own brand and customer base.

monthly.title: White-label buyout
noteList: You receive a lifetime right to use the app and website under your brand. Included: publishing, connecting all modules, databases, CRM, delivery, POS, etc. Hosting, databases, and integrations come under your control. The source code is not transferred.
Updates are available with an active maintenance subscription. One year of maintenance is free, then $50 per month for updates.

annually.title: SaaS model
noteList: POS, CRM, delivery, inventory, finance, analytics, support, and updates.
Suitable for those who want to quickly start using our platform without launching their own application.

annually.title: White-label
noteList: Mobile app for iOS/Android and website under your brand.
Ideal for restaurants and chains looking to develop their own brand and customer base.

annually.title: White-label buyout
noteList: You receive a lifetime right to use the app and website under your brand. Included: publishing, connecting all modules, databases, CRM, delivery, POS, etc. Hosting, databases, and integrations come under your control. The source code is not transferred.
Updates are available with an active maintenance subscription. One year of maintenance is free, then $50 per month for updates.

startSmall.title: Start small, grow without limits
startSmall.text: Launch your CRM and App platform in minutes — no code, no stress. We scale with you.
